text: Richard Mark Crossley (born 5 September 1970) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, in Hong Kong football for Michelotti and was on the books of Huddersfield Town without making a league appearance. Later he played in Hong Kong and China.Crossley in Asia ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Huddersfield Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Richard Crossley
